name: Hopsins Music Bot
description: Open-Source bot to play songs in your Telegram's Group Voice Chat. Powered by PyTgCalls.

SESSION_NAME.description: Enter String Session Pyrogram (P) for assistants that go up to VCG

BOT_NAME.description: The name of your MusicPlayer Bot.

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Your MusicPlayer support group without @ [skip this if you don't have one]

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Updates Channel without @ [skip this if you don't have it]

PROJECT_NAME.description: The name of your MusicPlayer project.

ASSISTANT_NAME.description: Your MusicPlayer assistant Telegram username without @.

ARQ_API_KEY.description: Take fire from the telegram boat Â» t.me/ARQRobot or @ARQRobot

BG_IMAGE.description: Custom Background Play Music Using Transparent Photo .png / .jpg format

API_ID.description: Enter APP ID Please Download from my.telegram.org/apps or t.me/scrapmanbot

API_HASH.description: Input HASH API Please Download from my.telegram.org/apps or t.me/scrapmanbot

SUDO_USERS.description: List of Telegram User ID users are counted as admins everywhere (separate using space)

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Maximum audio duration limit for download (minutes).
